products.description:
Use

  • All colours of fabric
  • Protects against rain, snow and salt damage. Prevents water from setting in
  • This will help seal the fabric, stitching and seams and prevent water from penetrating the fabric
  • Will remove scratches in the fabric by reconditioning it and replenishing the natural oils

Instructions

  • Surface must be clean and dry
  • Test on a small area; may darken some fabrics
  • Press the sponge applicator onto the shoe and squeeze the tube to release the lotion
  • Apply evenly to the entire leather surface
  • Wipe off with a clean, damp cloth
products.name: O470_099

products.description:
Use

  • These foam cushions provide extra support to the ball of your foot
  • Prevents from sliding forward in the shoe
  • Fits all sizes and all types of shoes

Instructions

  • Insert inside at the front part of the shoe
products.name: O470_042

products.description:
Use

  • All colours of Suede and Nubuck
  • Removes dirt and gently cleans
  • Gives the suede a fresh new look

Instructions

  • Always clean the suede shoes/boots prior to protecting â€“ this allows the protector to penetrate easily
  • Use the brush side first to remove dirt
  • Then, gently use the erasing block to remove any leftover scuffs
products.name: O470_041

products.description:
Use

  • Design to protect your heels and keep the shoe in place
  • Ideal for dress shoes and sandals

Instructions

  • Insert at the back of the shoe
products.name: O470_043

products.description:
Use

  • These thermal insoles help keep feet warm and dry
  • Their felt foam and aluminum layers are quilted together to help retain heat and keep water out
  • Ideal for winter boots

Instructions

  • Insert in any types of boots
  • Change once over used
products.name: O470_102

products.description:
Use

  • These terry cloth insoles help keep feet cool and fresh
  • Their terry lining helps absorb sweat and the latex backing is especially treated to eliminate odors
  • Ideal for sports shoes
  • Hand washable

Instructions

  • Insert in any types of sports shoes
  • Change once over used
products.name: O470_106

products.description:
Use

  • All colours of leather and synthetic
  • Glosses and shines

Instructions

  • Remove surface dirt
  • Brush sponge onto shoe to shine
  • No buffing required
products.name: O470_105

products.description:
Extend the life of your shoes by protecting them from the start! This product is water resistant and will keep you from getting your feet wet!

Use

  • All colours of synthetic and fabric.
  • Water based protector.
  • Protects against rain, snow and salt damage, and prevents water from setting in

Instructions

  • Apply on a dry and clean surface
  • Hold bottle upright 15-20 cm (6-8 inches) away and spray several coats evenly
products.name: Stamen

products.description:
Use

 

  • Removes dirt and salt stains on synthetic or fabric in seconds
  • Protects against permanent damage

Instructions

  • Remove wipe, unfold and wipe footwear thoroughly
products.name: Corwith

products.description:
Use

  • Effectively removes dirt and stains
  • Works to restore shine on all fabric
  • It's 3-in-1 functionality cleans, conditions and protects in one application

Instructions

  • Spray product surface lightly
  • Wipe gently with a clean, dry cloth using a circular motion
  • Repeat if necessary
products.name: Bursera

products.description:
Use

  • These gel sandal cushions provide more comfort
  • Prevents from sliding forward in the shoe
  • Protect toes against rubbing
  • They adjust to all sizes of all strappy footwear

Instructions

  • Insert inside at the front part of the sandal
